sentences.sentence: A major reason why many cancers are so dangerous is that they metastasize.
sentences.translation: 癌症的危险因素主要在于癌细胞转移。

sentences.sentence: "Those are the ones you want to catch," she said, "because they could metastasize and prove lethal."
sentences.translation: 她说：“那些是你们想要处理的，因为它们会转移和被证明是有致死性的。”

sentences.sentence: Younger women have fewer treatment options, she said. "Those types of breast cancer tend to metastasize (spread) early."
sentences.translation: Perkins同意这一个观点，说道，年轻的女性缺少检查的选择，这些形式的乳癌早期会转移，有可能转移到脑部。
